ACT
51
A person burdened with a legacy
The legatee has the right to demand the completion of the legacy from the person who is obliged to execute the record by the will.
If more than one person is obligated to fulfill the legacy, each person is responsible for the part of the estate that they receive, unless it can be concluded from the will that the testator wanted them to respond in a different way.
If the testator failed to specify who is obliged to fill out the legacy, the obligation to fill it out is imposed on all testamentary and legal heirs, including necessary heirs, in proportion to their hereditary parts.
